tool_description: Optimizes alternative text based on surrounding content, page context, and user interface placement to avoid redundancy and improve clarity.

alt_text.description: Initial alternative text to be optimized

surrounding_text.description: Text content surrounding the media element

page_title.description: Title of the page or document

ui_context.description: UI context: header, main_content, sidebar, footer, navigation, button, link

redundancy_check.description: Whether to remove redundant information from surrounding text

error_messages: Invalid alt text: Provide valid alternative text to optimize.
Invalid UI context: Use one of [header, main_content, sidebar, footer, navigation, button, link].
Invalid optimization focus: Use one of [brevity, completeness, context_awareness].
Optimization failed: Unable to improve the alt text with provided context information.
usage: Provide alt_text and optionally surrounding_text, page_title, ui_context, redundancy_check, and optimize_for. The tool returns contextually optimized alternative text.

redundancies_removed.description: Information removed due to context redundancy
